title: Worklog
content:
Worklog Weekly activities and learning progress during the internship period.

Introduction to AWS Cloud AWS Account Setup and IAM Basics Event: AWS Fundamentals Workshop Week 2: Compute Services

title: Events Participated
content:
Events Participated ‚ö†Ô∏è Note: The information below is for reference purposes only. Please do not copy verbatim for your report, including this warning.
In this section, you need to list and describe in detail the events that you participated in throughout your internship or work period.
Each event should be presented in the format Event 1, Event 2, Event 3…, along with the following information:
Event name Event time Location (if any) Your role in the event (participant, organizing support, speaker, etc.) Brief description of content and main activities in the event Results or value achieved (lessons learned, new skills, contributions to team/project) This listing helps clearly demonstrate your actual participation, as well as the soft skills and experience you have accumulated through each event.
During the internship period, I participated in 2 events, with each event being a memorable experience with new, interesting and useful knowledge, along with gifts and wonderful moments.
Event 1 Event Name: AWS Certification Bootcamp Time: 09:00 on February 15, 2024 Location: 26th Floor, Bitexco Building, 02 Hai Trieu Street, Saigon Ward, Ho Chi Minh City Role in Event: Participant Description: Intensive 2-day bootcamp focused on AWS Solutions Architect Associate certification Outcomes: Gained deep knowledge of core AWS services and prepared well for certification exam Event 2 Event Name: Cloud Migration Summit Time: 14:00 on March 8, 2024 Location: AWS Vietnam Office, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City Role in Event: Participant Description: Full-day conference on enterprise cloud migration strategies Outcomes: Enhanced understanding of migration assessment tools and cost optimization techniques
